content:
Does anyone know if there is CVDP output for SSP2-4.5 that is easily accessible? I found one webpage with a link to download a .tar file, but have been unable to find an access path on glade.

If there not a path to access this on glade, would you kindly check the webpage I've linked in my post to ensure this output is what I should use? Thanks in advance.
Boop! I found it! Here is the path: /glade/campaign/cesm/development/cvcwg/cvwg/CVDP_Data_Repository/cmip6.ssp245.cvdp_data.tar
